en.name: KumuluzEE RestClient
en.shortDescription: Implementation of MicroProfile RestClient 1.0.1 for KumuluzEE platform.
en.description:
As part of project "Development of microservices for blockchain support and application in CRM system domains (MBCRM)" I implemented MicroProfile specification for RestClient

MicroProfile

MicroProfile is an open-source JavaEE specification oriented towards microservice architecture

sl.name: KumuluzEE RestClient
sl.shortDescription: Implementacija MicroProfile RestClienta 1.0.1 za platformo KumuluzEE.
sl.description:
Kot del projekta "Razvoj mikrostoritev za podporo tehnologijam veriženja blokov (blockchain) in aplikacija na domeno CRM sistemov (akronim MBCRM)" sem implementiral MicroProfile specifikacijo RestClient-a

MicroProfile

MicroProfile je odprtokodna JavaEE specifikacija usmerjena v mikrostoritveno arhitekturo

en.name: DockerHub
en.shortDescription: Application for overview of Docker images in private registry
en.description: Application, which communicates with Docker Daemon API to get information about repositories and images

sl.name: DockerHub
sl.shortDescription: Aplikacija za pregled Docker slik v privatnem registru
sl.description: Aplikacija, ki preko Docker Daemon APIja pridobi podatke o repozitorijih in slikah in jih prikaže
